Title: 300: Rise of an Empire
Writer: Zack Snyder (screenplay), Kurt Johnstad (screenplay), Frank Miller (graphic novel "Xerxes")
Actors: Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green, Lena Headey, Hans Matheson
Plot: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.
Production: Cruel and Unusual Films, Mark Canton/Gianna Nunnari
